scripts.db-start: docker run --rm --network host --name ccca-pg-db -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=123456 -d postgres
scripts.db-psql: docker run -it --rm --network host  postgres psql -h 127.0.0.1 -U postgres
scripts.db-init: docker run -it --rm --network host --volume "$PWD/database:/database"  postgres psql -h 127.0.0.1 -U postgres --file /database/create.sql
